metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41500 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Incomplete string comparison vulnerability exits in cvxopt.org cvxop <= 1.2.6 in APIs (cvxopt.cholmod.diag, cvxopt.cholmod.getfactor, cvxopt.cholmod.solve, cvxopt.cholmod.spsolve), which allows attackers to conduct Denial of Service attacks by construct fake Capsule objects.

criterions.comment: cvxopt package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
